scripts.discordadmins:dev: echo 'ðŸ”§ Discord Admins is integrated into ticketbot and loaded automatically'
scripts.ticketbot:build: echo 'âœ… Ticketbot: No build needed (Node.js modules)'
scripts.hooks:build: echo 'âœ… Discordhooks: No build needed (Node.js modules)'
scripts.discordadmins:build: echo 'âœ… Discord Admins: No build needed (Node.js modules)'
scripts.build: npm run ticketbot:build && npm run hooks:build && npm run discordadmins:build && npm run frontend:build && (npm run ticketbot:deploy || echo 'âš ï¸ Deploy failed - check internet connection')
scripts.build:backend: npm run ticketbot:build && npm run hooks:build && npm run discordadmins:build
scripts.build:nodeploy: npm run ticketbot:build && npm run hooks:build && npm run discordadmins:build && npm run frontend:build
scripts.build:all: npm run build && echo 'âœ… Frontend built successfully' && echo 'ðŸš€ Backend services ready' && echo 'ðŸ“¡ Commands deployed to Discord'
scripts.dev: npx concurrently -n ticketbot,hooks,discordadmins,frontend,callback -c yellow,blue,cyan,green,red "npm run ticketbot:dev" "npm run hooks:dev" "npm run discordadmins:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run callback:dev"
scripts.dev:quiet: npx concurrently -n ticketbot,hooks,discordadmins,frontend -c yellow,blue,cyan,green --prefix-colors --hide "npm run ticketbot:dev" "npm run hooks:dev" "npm run discordadmins:dev" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.dev:minimal: npx concurrently -n ticketbot,discordadmins -c yellow,cyan "npm run ticketbot:dev" "npm run discordadmins:dev"
scripts.dev:check: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run dev
scripts.dev:fast: npx concurrently -n ticketbot,hooks,frontend -c yellow,blue,green "npm run ticketbot:dev" "npm run hooks:dev" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.dev:soft: npx concurrently -n ticketbot,hooks,frontend -c yellow,blue,green "npm run ticketbot:dev" "npm run hooks:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" || echo 'âš ï¸ Services starting...'
scripts.start: npx concurrently -n ticketbot,hooks,frontend -c yellow,blue,green "npm run ticketbot:start" "npm run hooks:start" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.test: npm run test:ticketbot && npm run test:hooks && npm run test:discordadmins && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:discordadmins: echo 'âœ… Discord Admins: No tests defined yet'
scripts.test:watch: npx concurrently -n ticketbot,hooks,frontend -c yellow,blue,green "npm run test:watch -w ticketbot" "npm run test:watch -w discordhooks" "npm run test:watch -w frontend"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:ticketbot && npm run test:coverage:hooks && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ticketbot && npm run lint:hooks && npm run lint:discordadmins && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:discordadmins: echo 'âœ… Discord Admins: No lint defined yet'
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:ticketbot && npm run lint:fix:hooks && npm run lint:fix:discordadmins && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.lint:fix:discordadmins: echo 'âœ… Discord Admins: No lint fix defined yet'
scripts.format: npm run format:ticketbot && npm run format:hooks && npm run format:discordadmins && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:discordadmins: echo 'âœ… Discord Admins: No format defined yet'
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:ticketbot && npm run format:check:hooks && npm run format:check:discordadmins && npm run format:check:frontend
scripts.format:check:discordadmins: echo 'âœ… Discord Admins: No format check defined yet'
